;;;62     void arm_pid_init_f32(
000000  edd00a06          VLDR     s1,[r0,#0x18]
;;;63       arm_pid_instance_f32 * S,
;;;64       int32_t resetStateFlag)
;;;65     {
;;;66     
;;;67       /* Derived coefficient A0 */
;;;68       S->A0 = S->Kp + S->Ki + S->Kd;
000004  ed900a07          VLDR     s0,[r0,#0x1c]
000008  ee301a80          VADD.F32 s2,s1,s0
00000c  ed900a08          VLDR     s0,[r0,#0x20]
000010  ee311a00          VADD.F32 s2,s2,s0
000014  ed801a00          VSTR     s2,[r0,#0]
;;;69     
;;;70       /* Derived coefficient A1 */
;;;71       S->A1 = (-S->Kp) - ((float32_t) 2.0 * S->Kd);
000018  eeb01a00          VMOV.F32 s2,#2.00000000
00001c  ee500a41          VNMLA.F32 s1,s0,s2
000020  edc00a01          VSTR     s1,[r0,#4]
;;;72     
;;;73       /* Derived coefficient A2 */
;;;74       S->A2 = S->Kd;
000024  ed800a02          VSTR     s0,[r0,#8]
;;;75     
;;;76       /* Check whether state needs reset or not */
;;;77       if(resetStateFlag)
000028  2900              CMP      r1,#0
00002a  d003              BEQ      |L1.52|
;;;78       {
;;;79         /* Clear the state buffer.  The size will be always 3 samples */
;;;80         memset(S->state, 0, 3u * sizeof(float32_t));
00002c  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00002e  60c1              STR      r1,[r0,#0xc]
000030  6101              STR      r1,[r0,#0x10]
000032  6141              STR      r1,[r0,#0x14]
                  |L1.52|
;;;81       }
;;;82     
;;;83     }
000034  4770              BX       lr
;;;84     
                          ENDP
